;NREUM.info={beacon:"bam.nr-data.net",errorBeacon:"bam.nr-data.net",licenseKey:"fb79b04985",applicationID:"116575036",sa:1}
</script>

<script type="application/javascript">
  var clientIP="any";
  function getIP(json) {
    document.write(json.ip);
	clientIP = json.ip;
  }
</script>

<script type="application/javascript" src="https://api.ipify.org?format=jsonp&callback=getIP"></script>

<script type="text/plain" class="optanon-category-C0002">
	newrelic.setCustomAttribute('ip_address', clientIP);
</script>
	
	<script src="/js/libs/modernizr-respond.js"></script>
	<script src="/js/jquery.js"></script>
	<script src="/js/jquery-ui.js"></script>
	<script src="/js/bwjsapi.js"></script>
	</head>
<body id="bw-container">
	<!-- Google Tag Manager -->

    <noscript>
        <iframe data-src="https://www.googletagmanager.com/ns.html?id=GTM-T4KGVRR" class="optanon-category-C0002" height="0" width="0" style="display:none;visibility:hidden">
        </iframe>

		<h2><span>Search</span></h2>
		<div id="bw-search-container" >
			<form id="bw-search-form" name="bw-search-form" action="/portal/site/home/template.SINGLEPORTLET/action.process/search/?javax.portlet.action=true&currentTemplateID=PAGE&javax.portlet.tpst=503a8767054f0df6a9e77a100d908a0c&javax.portlet.begCacheTok=com.vignette.cachetoken&javax.portlet.endCacheTok=com.vignette.cachetoken" method="post">
				<fieldset>
					<div id="bw-search-options">
						<a id="bw-search-alt" href="/portal/site/home/search?javax.portlet.tpst=503a8767054f0df6a9e77a100d908a0c&javax.portlet.pbp_503a8767054f0df6a9e77a100d908a0c_view=advancedSearch&javax.portlet.begCacheTok=com.vignette.cachetoken&javax.portlet.endCacheTok=com.vignette.cachetoken" title="Advanced News Search"><span>Advanced News Search</span></a>
					</div>
					<label for="bw-search-input">Advanced News Search</label>
					<input type="search" id="bw-search-input" name="q" maxlength="256" value="" title="Search BusinessWire.com" placeholder="Search" />
					<input type="hidden" id="bw-search-type" name="qSearchType" value="all" />
					<button type="submit" class="bw-button-primary" id="bw-search-button" title="Search"><span><img src="/images/icons/icon_search.gif" alt="Search" /></span></button> 	

				</fieldset>
			</form>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>


<script>
    //set ie expire flag here
    var isIEExpired = true;
	// Add search options toggle
	
	// **I18N STRINGS
	var strAll = 'Search All';
	var strNews = 'Search News';
	var strSite = 'Search Site';
	var strAdv = 'Advanced News Search';
	var strOptions = 'Search Options';

	// **define search action and advanced-search target
	var strAdvLocation = '/portal/site/home/search?javax.portlet.tpst=503a8767054f0df6a9e77a100d908a0c&javax.portlet.pbp_503a8767054f0df6a9e77a100d908a0c_view=advancedSearch&javax.portlet.begCacheTok=com.vignette.cachetoken&javax.portlet.endCacheTok=com.vignette.cachetoken';

	function searchByUrl() {
		window.location.href = '/portal/site/home/search/?searchType=' + $('#bw-search-type').val() + '&searchTerm=' + encodeURIComponent($('#bw-search-input').val()) + '&searchPage=1';
		return false;
	}
	
</script>
<script src="/js/search.js" ></script>

					<li><a href="http://newsroom.businesswire.com/contact" class="bw-outbound">Contact Us</a></li>
					<li><a href="https://services.businesswire.com/uk-tax-strategy-page" target="_blank" class="bw-outbound">UK Tax Strategy</a></li>
					<li><a href="https://services.businesswire.com/privacy">Privacy Statement</a></li>
					<li><a href="#" class="ot-sdk-show-settings" text="Manage Cookies">Manage Cookies</a></li>
					<li><a href="/portal/site/home/terms-of-use/">Terms of Use</a></li>
					<li><a href="/portal/site/home/copyright/">&copy; 2024 Business Wire</a></li>
				</ul>
			</div>
		</div>
	    <div id="ie-warn">        
	        <span class="ieWarningSpan">
	        <span id="closeButton" class="icon-close-default"><img src="/images/icons/icon-close-default.svg"/></span>
	        <span id="warningContent" style="display:none">
	            Internet Explorer presents a security risk. To ensure the most secure and best overall experience on our website we recommend the latest versions of 
	            <a href="https://www.google.com/chrome/">Chrome</a>, 
                <a href="https://www.microsoft.com/edge">Edge</a>, 
                <a href="https://www.mozilla.org/firefox/">Firefox</a>, or 
                <a href="https://support.apple.com/downloads/safari">Safari</a>.  Internet Explorer will not be supported as of August 17, 2021.	             
	        </span>
	        <span id="expireContent" style="display:none">
                Internet Explorer is no longer supported. To ensure the most secure and best overall experience on our website, we recommend the latest versions of              
	            <a href="https://www.google.com/chrome/">Chrome</a>, 
	            <a href="https://www.microsoft.com/edge">Edge</a>, 
	            <a href="https://www.mozilla.org/firefox/">Firefox</a>, or 
	            <a href="https://support.apple.com/downloads/safari">Safari</a>.
	        </span>
	        </span>     
	    </div>
  </footer>
  
   <script>
	$(function () {
		var expiredate = new Date('2021-08-17T00:00:00');
		var now = new Date();
		var ieExpired = now.getTime() > expiredate.getTime();
		//if we find var from config, use it
		if (typeof isIEExpired !== 'undefined') {
			ieExpired = isIEExpired;
		}
		//Name cookie
		var cookieName = 'IEWarningCookie';
		//Read cookie
		var cookieFound = getCookie(cookieName);
		// Microsoft Internet Explorer detected in.      
		if (!cookieFound
			&& isIE()) {
			showIEWarning(true);
		} else {
			showIEWarning(false);
		}

		$('#closeButton').on('click', function () {
			setCookie(cookieName, 'true');
			showIEWarning(false);
		});

		function showIEWarning(show) {
			if (show) {
				if ($('#bw-home').length) {
					$('#bw-home').addClass('ie-warn');
				}
				if ($('#bw-main').length) {
					$('#bw-main').addClass('ie-warn');
				}
				if($('#ie-warn').length) {
					$('#ie-warn').css('display', 'block');
					$('.ieWarningSpan').css('display', 'block');
					$('#closeButton').css('display', 'block');	
					if (ieExpired) {						
						$('#expireContent').css('display', 'block');						
					} else {
						$('#warningContent').css('display', 'block');
					}
				}
			} else {
				if ($('#bw-home').length) {
					$('#bw-home').removeClass('ie-warn');
				}
				if ($('#bw-main').length) {
					$('#bw-main').removeClass('ie-warn');
				}
				if($('#ie-warn').length) {
					$('#ie-warn').css('display', 'none');
					$('.ieWarningSpan').css('display', 'none');
					$('#closeButton').css('display', 'none');
					if (ieExpired) {						
						$('#warningContent').css('display', 'none');						
					} else {
						$('#warningContent').css('display', 'none');
					}	
				}
			}
		}

		// Create cookie
		function setCookie(key, value) {
			document.cookie = key + "=" + value + "; expires=30; path=/;secure=true;domain=" + '.businesswire.com';
		}

		function getCookie(key) {
			var allCookies = document.cookie;
			var thisCookiePos = allCookies.indexOf(key);
			if (thisCookiePos != -1) {
				return true;
			}
			return false;
		}

		function isIE() {
			if (navigator && navigator.userAgent) {
				var ua = navigator.userAgent.toUpperCase();
				if (ua.indexOf("MSIE ") > -1
					|| ua.indexOf("TRIDENT/") > -1) {
					return true;
				}
			}
			return false;
		}
		
		$('#login_form').submit(function() {
			if(isIE() && ieExpired ) {
				if ($('#ie-expire').length) {
					$('#ie-expire').css("display","block");
					return false;
				}
			} else {
				return true;
			}
		});

		$('#closeIEExpireIcon').on('click', function() {
			$('#ie-expire').css('display','none');
		});
	});
  </script>

	<script>
	// Add link to features box for large displays (image link is blocked by text div)
	var features = jQuery('.bw-home-features-text');
	function setFeatures() {
		if (features.css('position') == 'absolute') {
			features.css('cursor', 'pointer');
			features.click(function() {
				window.location.href=jQuery(this).find('h2 a').first().attr('href'); /* Get the URL from the heading link */
			});
		}
	}
	function resetFeatures() {
		features.css('cursor', 'default');
		features.unbind('click');
	};
	// Initial test for features
	setFeatures();
	// Test again if window is resized
	jQuery(window).resize(function() {
		resetFeatures();
		setFeatures();
	});
	
	// Multimedia gallery
	function replaceMissingSrc(src) {
			var thisSrcParts = src.split('/4/');
			//Replace it with the high-res src
			return thisSrcParts[0] + '/5/' +  thisSrcParts[1];
	}
	function removeImg(img) {
		jQuery(img).remove();
	}
	
	if (jQuery('#bw-headlines-mm').length == 1 && jQuery('#bw-group-4').css('float') == 'left') {
		// Hide gallery temporarily while it's transformed
		jQuery('#bw-headlines-mm').css('display', 'none');
		jQuery('#bw-headlines-mm').attr('id', 'bw-headlines-mm-js');
		jQuery('#bw-headlines-mm-js').css('display', 'none');
		var thisGallery = jQuery('#bw-headlines-mm-js');
		// Hide all thumbnails but last
		thisGallery.find('.bwThumbs a').css('display', 'none');
		thisGallery.find('.bwThumbs a:last-child').css('display', 'block');
		// Replace last thumbnail with low-res
		thisGallery.find('.bwThumbs a:last-child img').each( function() {
			var thisImg = jQuery(this);
			//Get the src
			var thisSrc = thisImg.attr('src');
			var srcParts = thisSrc.split('/2/');
			//Replace it with the low-res src
			var newSrc = srcParts[0] + '/4/' +  srcParts[1];
			thisImg.attr('src', newSrc);
			thisImg.attr('onerror', 'this.src=replaceMissingSrc(this.src);this.onerror=removeImg(this)');
		});
		thisGallery.css('display', 'block');
	};

		// Cancel hover menus for touch devices, then change menu link to toggle the hover (but not if whole nav is toggled)
		var hasTouch = ("ontouchstart" in window);
		if ( hasTouch && jQuery('#bw-nav h2').css('display')=='none' ) {
			new BWNav("#bw-nav > ul", "#bw-nav > ul > li > a").toggleMenus();
		};
	</script>
</body>
</html>
